subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Blackhawks scored with 49.3 seconds left, completing a 3-2 comeback win over Colorado. Halfway through a shortened season, they have at least one point in every game.
snippet: The Blackhawks scored with 49.3 seconds left, completing a 3-2 comeback win over Colorado. Halfway through a shortened season, they have at least one point in every game.
